class.name: SphereOccluder3D
class.brief_description: Spherical shape for use with occlusion culling in [OccluderInstance3D].
class.description: [SphereOccluder3D] stores a sphere shape that can be used by the engine's occlusion culling system. See [OccluderInstance3D]'s documentation for instructions on setting up occlusion culling.
